relationships.description: Hermione asks Lockhart for permission to borrow a book from the Restricted Section of the library. ("‘Er – Professor Lockhart?’ Hermione stammered. ‘I wanted to – to get this book out of the library . Just for background reading.’")

Lockhart grants permission to Hermione to borrow a book from the Restricted Section of the library. ("‘Ah, Gadding with Ghouls!’ said Lockhart, taking the note from Hermione and smiling widely at her.")
Hermione mentions that she has read Gadding with Ghouls. ("‘Oh, yes,’ said Hermione eagerly . ‘So clever, the way you trapped that last one with the tea-strainer ...’")
